column2: Counsel  for the  Accused-Appellant  informs Court that the  Accused-Appellant

Hon. Justice K. K. Wickremasinghe: Padmasena  Mendis  Jayasinghe  has  passed  away.  Certified  copy  of  the
death  certificate  is  in  the file of docket produced  by  the Attorney - at -

for  the  Appellant. 
Copy  of  the  same  to  be 
issued 
to
